mapper.select: SELECT start_work, after_work, work_time, work_status, add_work_time, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM work WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM start_work) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM start_work) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) AND work_status <> '정상') AS status_count FROM work WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM start_work) = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM start_work) = EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) ORDER BY start_work DESC

SELECT start_work, after_work, work_time, work_status, add_work_time FROM work WHERE 1 = 1
AND start_work BETWEEN #{stDate} AND #{endDate} + 1
ORDER BY start_work DESC
SELECT start_work, after_work, work_no FROM WORK WHERE TRUNC(start_work) = TRUNC(sysdate) AND user_no = #{userNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT MAX(WORK_NO) + 1 FROM WORK
INSERT INTO WORK ( work_status , start_work , work_no , user_no ) VALUES ( CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI') < '09:01' THEN '정상' ELSE '지각' END , SYSDATE , #{workNo} , #{userNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE WORK SET after_work = SYSDATE, work_time = ROUND((SYSDATE - start_work) * 24 , 1) -1, add_work_time = F_ADD_WORK_TIME(SYSDATE), work_status = CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI') < '17:59' THEN '조퇴' ELSE NVL(work_status, '정상') END WHERE work_no = #{workNo}
